snippet: A writer from the A.C.L.U. says a new Pentagon policy is flawed because women get more paid leave than men do.
lead_paragraph: A writer from the A.C.L.U. says a new Pentagon policy is flawed because women get more paid leave than men do.

headline.main: For Pentagon Equity in Parental Leave
